review: I was able to get this for $19 so no real complaints. It works fast and smooth andbhas great picture quality with the tvs it works on. that being said, my main tv is a 50" samsung dlp and it will not work. Says not supported mode and thats a bummer for me. Also the hdmi plug doesn't seem to be exactly standard because it would not fit into 2 of my tvs. I tried for 15 minutes to plug this thing in and even spun the tv around. i compared it to an hdmi cord that plugs right in and the slot inside the fire stick where the terminals are is slightly smaller.  The extension it came with is similiar but i was able to get it in after almost breaking the hdmi slot on my tv. after all that it works great and on my other tvs it plugs right in. I want to give this 5 stars because the software is nice and easy to use. Ive not had a single slow down or buffer issue and it loads movies so fast. i just cant because of the compatibility issues ive had.  So to sum it up i have a 7yo Samsung dlp it will not work with and had a very hard time plugging in. i have a 3yo insignia plasma with the same plug issue but it does work after forcing it in. And i have three 32" samsung leds about a year old that plug in fine and work also. So it seems that older tvs have the issues and thats sad because most newer tvs are smart withs apps and you really wouldn't need this for those.
